title: SML_StartupDrive (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SML_StartupDrive
Helper function block for commissioning.
This function block contains the most used function blocks for commissioning like
MC_Power_SML
,
MC_MoveVelocity_SML
,
MC_Home_SML
,
MC_ReadParameter_SML
It comes with a visualization template that makes it very easy to use.

rows.Name: fActPosition
rows.Comment:
The actual position of the axis [u], used in the
visualization template.
